articles.author: Will Reeve, Sony Salzman, Cameron Harrison, Kirk Cohall
articles.title: Neuralink says they’re looking to implant next 2 participants in coming months - Good Morning America
articles.description: Elon Musk's Neuralink told ABC News that it is looking to implant two more participants in the coming months.
articles.content:
Neuralink is planning to implant two new study participants with the company's brain computer interface in the coming months, the company told ABC News.
